projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A fully-functional e-commerce website with product listings, shopping cart,  using MERN stack.

projects.title: Social Media App
projects.description: Build a real-time social media platform with user authentication, posts, likes, and messaging features using MERN stack.

projects.title: Task Management Tool
projects.description: A project management tool that allows users to create, update, and manage tasks with features like drag-and-drop and real-time updates.

projects.title: Online Learning Platform
projects.description: A learning management system (LMS) where users can enroll in courses, track progress, and complete assignments, all built with MERN stack.

projects.title: Job Portal
projects.description: A job board platform that allows employers to post jobs and job seekers to apply, complete with profile management and notifications.

projects.title: Real Estate Listing App
projects.description: A real estate platform for listing properties, advanced search filters, and agent-client communication, built with MERN stack.

projects.title: Recipe Sharing Platform
projects.description: A user-driven platform where individuals can share and discover new recipes, with features for saving favorites and ratings.

projects.title: Travel Booking App
projects.description: An app for booking flights, hotels, and car rentals, with real-time availability updates and user reviews, built with MERN stack.

projects.title: Fitness Tracker
projects.description: A fitness app that allows users to track workouts, set goals, and monitor progress with charts and notifications.

projects.title: Blogging Platform
projects.description: A user-friendly blogging platform with post creation, editing, and commenting features, built with MERN stack.
